## BUSINESS PROFILE

### Company Information
Name: TIGON Personal Transportation Vehicles
Short Name: TIGON PTV
Industry: Personal Transportation Vehicle Sales, Service, and Rentals
Business Type: Authorized PTV Dealership
Website: https://tigonptv.com
Email: info@tigonptv.com
Phone: 1-844-844-6638

### Business Description
TIGON PTV is North America's premier personal transportation vehicle dealership, specializing in DENAGO and EVOLUTION electric vehicles. We provide comprehensive sales, service, rental, and financing solutions for customers seeking eco-friendly, street-legal transportation alternatives across all 50 United States, Canada, and Mexico.

### Brands Represented
Primary Brands:
- DENAGO Electric Vehicles
- EVOLUTION Electric Vehicles

### Service Areas
Coverage: All 50 US States, Canada, Mexico
Nationwide delivery and service available

## COMPLETE VEHICLE INVENTORY FOR AI TRAINING

### DENAGO Vehicle Models

#### DENAGO EV City
Type: 2-Passenger Street-Legal PTV
Top Speed: 25 mph
Range: Up to 40 miles per charge
Seating: 2 passengers
Battery: Lithium-ion
Motor: Electric AC motor
Features: LED lights, USB charging ports, rear cargo area, street-legal package
Use Cases: Urban commuting, campus transportation, neighborhood travel
Price Range: $8,000 - $12,000

#### DENAGO EV Nomad
Type: 4-Passenger Adventure PTV
Top Speed: 25 mph
Range: Up to 50 miles per charge
Seating: 4 passengers
Features: All-terrain tires, lifted suspension, off-road capability
Use Cases: Camping, hunting, outdoor recreation, ranch work
Price Range: $12,000 - $16,000

#### DENAGO EV Nomad XL
Type: 6-Passenger Extended Adventure PTV
Top Speed: 25 mph
Range: Up to 60 miles per charge
Seating: 6 passengers (3-row)
Features: Extended cargo area, enhanced battery, premium suspension
Use Cases: Group outdoor activities, large family transportation
Price Range: $16,000 - $20,000

#### DENAGO EV Rover XL
Type: 4-Passenger Luxury PTV
Top Speed: 25 mph
Range: Up to 50 miles per charge
Seating: 4 passengers
Features: Premium upholstery, enhanced audio, climate comfort
Price Range: $14,000 - $18,000

#### DENAGO EV Rover XL6
Type: 6-Passenger Extended Luxury PTV
Top Speed: 25 mph
Range: Up to 55 miles per charge
Seating: 6 passengers
Features: Three-row seating, premium features throughout
Price Range: $18,000 - $22,000

#### DENAGO EV Rover XXL
Type: 8-Passenger Maximum Capacity PTV
Top Speed: 25 mph
Range: Up to 60 miles per charge
Seating: 8 passengers
Features: Maximum passenger capacity, extended cargo, premium amenities
Price Range: $22,000 - $28,000

### EVOLUTION Vehicle Models

#### EVOLUTION Classic Series
Models: Classic 2 Plus, Classic 2 Pro, Classic 4 Plus, Classic 4 Pro
Seating: 2-4 passengers
Features: Traditional styling, modern electric drivetrain
Price Range: $10,000 - $18,000

#### EVOLUTION D5 Maverick Series
Models: Maverick 4, 4 Plus, 6, 6 Plus, 22, 22 Plus, 42 Plus
Seating: 4-6 passengers
Features: Sport-tuned suspension, performance-oriented design
Price Range: $14,000 - $24,000

#### EVOLUTION D5 Ranger Series
Models: Ranger 4, 4 Plus, 6, 6 Plus, 22, 22 Plus, 42 Plus
Seating: 4-6 passengers
Features: Utility-focused, enhanced cargo capacity
Price Range: $14,000 - $24,000

#### EVOLUTION D6 Max Series
Models: D6 Max GT4, GT6, XT4, XT6
Seating: 4-6 passengers
Features: Premium performance, luxury appointments
Price Range: $18,000 - $28,000

#### EVOLUTION Carrier Series
Models: Carrier 6 Plus, Carrier 8 Plus
Seating: 6-8 passengers
Features: Maximum passenger capacity, utility bed options
Price Range: $20,000 - $30,000

#### EVOLUTION Forester Series
Models: Forester 4 Plus, Forester 6 Plus
Seating: 4-6 passengers
Features: All-terrain capability, rugged construction
Price Range: $16,000 - $24,000

#### EVOLUTION Turfman Series
Models: Turfman 200 Plus, 800 Plus, 1000, 1000 Plus
Type: Utility/Work Vehicles
Features: Turf-friendly tires, utility beds, commercial-grade
Price Range: $12,000 - $20,000

- Preventive maintenance programs

- Suspension and brake service

- Daily rentals
- Weekly rentals
- Monthly rentals
- Event rentals
- Corporate rentals
- Seasonal rentals

### Financing Options

- Lease-to-own programs
- Zero-down financing
- Low-interest financing
- Commercial financing
- Fleet financing programs
